scripts.watch-consumer-css: nodemon --exec 'yarn build-consumer-css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write dist/consumer.css' --ext css,scss --watch scripts --watch src
scripts.watch-duomo-css: nodemon --exec 'yarn build-duomo-css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write dist/duomo.css' --ext css,scss --watch scripts --watch src
scripts.watch-layout-css: nodemon --exec 'yarn build-layout-css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write dist/layout.css' --ext css,scss --watch scripts --watch src
scripts.build-consumer-css: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/consumer.scss dist/consumer.css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write dist/consumer.css
scripts.build-duomo-css: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/duomo.scss dist/duomo.css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write dist/duomo.css
scripts.build-duomo-min-css: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/duomo.min.scss dist/duomo.min.css && yarn cleancss -O2 dist/duomo.min.css --output dist/duomo.min.css
scripts.build-layout-css: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/layout.scss dist/layout.css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write dist/layout.css
scripts.build-layout-min-css: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/layout.min.scss dist/layout.min.css && yarn cleancss -O2 dist/layout.min.css --output dist/layout.min.css
scripts.build: yarn rimraf dist && yarn concurrently --raw 'yarn build-duomo-css' 'yarn build-duomo-min-css' 'yarn build-layout-css' 'yarn build-layout-min-css' 'yarn build-js' && yarn stats
